alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:37AM CDT until May 30 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dixon County in northeastern Nebraska... Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 136 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Volin to near Meckling to near Maskell, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Wakonda around 140 AM CDT. Centerville, Viborg and Union Grove State Park around 150 AM CDT. Beresford, Alcester and Davis around 155 AM CDT. Canton, Hawarden, Lennox, Worthing, Hudson and Newton Hills State Park around 200 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Nebraska...and southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northeastern Nebraska...and southeastern South Dakota.
